text: People who form a couple, or who are married, very often have an agreement that they will only have sex with each other, and with no one else. If one of the two has sex with someone else, this is called infidelity. Infidelity is common: About half of the men, and a quarter of women reported having an extra-marital affair, according to the Kinsey Reports, done in the 1950s. In many countries, where religion is still present in everyday life (mostly in Africa and Asia), being untrue to the one you love is a criminal offense. In most European countries and the Americas, it is no longer a crime punishable by law. Infidelity is one the reasons and causes for divorce. Black men are more prone to cheating. == Related pages == * Adultery is the same concept, but usually with a religious background. * Cuckolding == References == ==Other websites== *Who Cheats More?
